statements: SELECT * FROM comedy_specials;
SELECT title, comedian, genre FROM comedy_specials ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials WHERE genre='Stand-up Comedy';
SELECT title, rating FROM comedy_specials WHERE rating > 8;
SELECT title, comedian, genre FROM comedy_specials WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' AND rating < 7 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials ORDER BY rating DESC, release_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT title, comedian, genre FROM comedy_specials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up Comedy' ORDER BY comedian ASC
SELECT title, rating FROM comedy_specials ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT comedian, genre FROM comedy_specials WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY comedian ASC, genre DESC
SELECT title, rating, release_date FROM comedy_specials WHERE comedian = 'Dave Chappelle' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials
SELECT name, category FROM comedy_specials WHERE release_year > 2010
SELECT id, name, release_year FROM comedy_specials ORDER BY release_year DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT id, name, category, release_year FROM comedy_specials WHERE category = 'Stand-Up'
SELECT name, category FROM comedy_specials WHERE release_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials WHERE category = 'Stand-up Comedy' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT name, release_year FROM comedy_specials WHERE category = 'Sketch Comedy' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, category, release_year FROM comedy_specials WHERE category = 'Sitcom' AND release_year > 2010;
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.name, c.category FROM users u INNER JOIN comedy_specials c ON u.id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM ComedySpecials;
SELECT title, release_year, genre FROM ComedySpecials WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT id, title, release_year FROM ComedySpecials WHERE genre='Stand-up Comedy';
SELECT title, description FROM ComedySpecials WHERE release_year = 2021 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM ComedySpecials WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM ComedySpecials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up' ORDER BY release_year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ComedySpecials WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND rating > 7.5;
SELECT id, title, rating FROM ComedySpecials WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, genre FROM ComedySpecials WHERE genre IN ('Stand-up', 'Sketch Comedy') AND duration_minutes < 90;
SELECT * FROM ComedySpecials WHERE description LIKE '%funny%' ORDER BY release_year ASC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials;
SELECT special_id, title, comedian FROM comedy_specials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up';
SELECT title, release_year FROM comedy_specials WHERE comedian = 'Trevor Noah';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, genre_preference FROM user_preferences JOIN users ON user_preferences.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM comedy_specials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT title, comedian, genre FROM comedy_specials WHERE release_year > 2015 ORDER BY comedian, title;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, rs.recommendation_date, cs.title, cs.genre FROM users u JOIN recommended_specials rs ON u.user_id = rs.user_id JOIN comedy_specials cs ON rs.special_id = cs.special_id;

SELECT u.username, rs.recommendation_date, cs.title, cs.genre FROM users u JOIN recommended_specials rs ON u.user_id = rs.user_id JOIN comedy_specials cs ON rs.special_id = cs.special_id WHERE cs.genre = 'Stand-up';
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT special_id, title, release_date FROM ComedySpecial WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT genre_id, name FROM Genre ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT u.username, cs.title, sc.rating FROM User u JOIN UserComedySpecial sc ON u.user_id = sc.user_id JOIN ComedySpecial cs ON sc.special_id = cs.special_id WHERE sc.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, release_date FROM ComedySpecial WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT User.username, ComedySpecial.title, UserComedySpecial.rating FROM User JOIN UserComedySpecial ON User.user_id = UserComedySpecial.user_id JOIN ComedySpecial ON UserComedySpecial.special_id = ComedySpecial.special_id;
SELECT Genre.name, COUNT(SpecialGenre.special_id) AS total_specials FROM Genre JOIN SpecialGenre ON Genre.genre_id = SpecialGenre.genre_id GROUP BY Genre.name ORDER BY total_specials DESC;
